summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6169 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 10, Highland View Addition, being the alley between 19th Avenue Northwest and 20th Avenue Northwest from West 85th Street to West 87th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 86446, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
